reporting-org.narrative: International Network for Bamboo and Rattan(INBAR)

title.narrative: MODEL ENTERPRISES FOR HOUSEHOLD CHARCOAL AND BIOMASS ENERGY

description.narrative: To establish bio-energy industry, to demonstrate new technologies

participating-org.narrative: International Center for Bamboo and Rattan
International Network for Bamboo and Rattan (INBAR)
International Network for Bamboo and Rattan (INBAR)

mailing-address.narrative: East Africa Regional Office INBAR, Addis Ababa, Ethiopia

recipient-country.narrative: Set-up bamboo charcoal NCPP model enterprise and cluster development for clean energy and enterprise development.
Set-up bamboo charcoal NCPP model enterprise and cluster development for clean energy and enterprise development.

sector.narrative: Set-up bamboo charcoal NCPP model enterprise and cluster development for clean energy and enterprise development.

comment.narrative: 2 ToTs organised for cluster leader to operationalise NCPP enterprise and 1 enterprise supported to produce mould and briquette. 2 new NCPP (NGO+ Community+ Professional Partnership) based bamboo charcoal briqueting enterprise is operating in full swing at Busia in Kenya and Nansena in Uganda. Both the enterprises are supporting livelihoods and clean energy for 2396 HHs. 2 stove and mould production enterprises Climate Smart in Uganda and Clean Tech Energy supported.

During the first year of implementation, the programme identified potential clusters in the beneficiary countries to establish two bamboo charcoal briquetting enterprise.The machinery and equipment needed for production of 1-ton-shift pillow block briquettes was procured. The NCPP model enterprise in Kenya and Uganda will be operational in Year-2.

NCPP (NGO+ Community+ Professional Partnership) based two bamboo charcoal units installed and commission in Busia, Kenya and Kampala in Uganda. Around 873 rural women have been involved in collecting and processing bamboo and waste charcoal for producing household clean energy and enhancing household income. 2 ToTs organised for cluster leader to opeartionalise NCPP enetrprise and 1 enterpise supported to produce mould and briquitte.

Five bamboo bio-energy industry established; three technology demonstrated; four stove and mould production enterprise. Two biomass energy business cases; 5000 (5000W) and smallholders benefiting from enterprise.
